content: to ** once 50 54 62 66 78 sts sm work corresponding cable chart row over last 30sts round 1 work in seed stitch to m sm k1 sm repeat round 1 until sleeve measures 1 5 -4cm from continue to work row 2 and 3 from previous section underarm until sweater measures 14 5 15 15 5 16 16 5 -37 38 39 75 40 5 42 cm from underarm ending after working decreases round ssk work in seed stitch to 2sts before row 2 or row 12 of the cable chart m k2tog sm k1 sm 2sts decrease repeat the decrease round every 1 5 -4cm a total of 4 hem 4 6 6 8 times 40 44 48 52 60 sts sizes 1 and 4 only row 1 rs k2 p2 repeat to 2sts before m k2 rm p2 continue working round 1 until sleeve measures k2 repeat to 3sts before next m p2 k1 rm k1 rm p2 16 -40 5cm from underarm k2 repeat to 1st before next m p1 rm p1 rm k2 p2 repeat to 1st before last m slip next stitch knitwise to cuff left hand needle rm replace stitch on right hand needle k1 m1r p2 k2 to end of row 1st increase cuff round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end of round sizes 2 3 and 5 only repeat cuff round 1 until cuff measures 2 5 -6 25cm row 1 rs k2 p2 repeat to 2sts before m k2 rm p2 bind off all stitches loosely in rib k2 repeat to 3sts before next m p2 k1 rm k1 rm p2 k2 repeat to 3sts before next m p2 k1 rm k1 rm p2 repeat for second sleeve k2 repeat to 5sts before m p2 k1 k2tog rm k2 p2 repeat to 2sts before end of row k2 1st decrease 178 194 214 234 254 sts row 2 ws p2 k2 repeat to 2sts before end of row p2 row 3 k2 p2 repeat to 2sts before end of row k2 repeat row 2 and 3 until hem measures 2 5 -6 25cm ending after row 2 bind off all stitches loosely in rib 4 www christinadanaee com text and photos ©christina danaee 2018 pockets with ws facing transfer 16sts placed on waste yarn to g lossary working needle join yarn and purl across all stitches pm - place marker continue working these 16sts in stockinette stitch until sm slip marker pocket measures 4 5 -11 5cm bind off all stitches rm remove marker loosely m1r - make one stitch right leaning m1l make one stitch left leaning with rs facing carefully remove provisional cast on k2tog knit two stitches together as one and transfer 16sts to working needle join yarn and knit ssk slip two stitches knitwise knit those two across all stitches turn work and purl across all stitches together as one stitches sl slip one stitch knitwise psso - pass slipped stitch over i-cord bind off
